<abstract>
 <para>This chapter describes configurations used in Collaboration. It consists of the following main sections:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Configuration.ComponentsineXoCollaborationConfiguration">Components</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of main components that take init-param in the applications of Collaboration, including: CalendarService, HistoryImpl, XMPPMessenger, DefaultPresenceStatus, and ContactService.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Configuration.ExternalComponentPlugins">External Component Plugins</link>
          </emphasis>
		</para>
        <para>Description of configurations of external component plugins used to implement Calendar, Chat, Contact, Content and Mail applications.
		</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Configuration.DataInjectorService">Data Injectors</link>
          </emphasis>
		</para>
        <para>Description of data injectors used to create data for performance test in Collaboration and instruction on how to use them.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.Configuration.eXoChatserverConfiguration">eXo Chatserver Configuration</link>
          </emphasis>
		</para>

      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
